body.name: Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack, Adjustable (26.8" to 34.6") Large Dish Drying Rack for Kitchen Counter with Multiple Baskets Utensil Sponge Holder Sink Caddy, 2 Tier Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 5 mins
features: Vertical Dish Drying Rack for Small Kitchen Counter: A great solution for adding vertical counter space, with an over-the-sink design that water on a dish or spoon will directly drain into the sink for small kitchens and a counter organizer. All the dish drying racks and their accessories can be hung and removed as your will.

Adjustable Size and Compatibility: (Length Adjustable From 26.8" to 34.6") x Width 12.4" (Fixed) x Height 20.5" (Fixed). The middle bar away from the back wall is about 0.86 inches (22mm). The lower middle bar height is 7.3 inches (185mm). The Upper middle bar height is 18.3 inches(465mm). The integrated and wall-mounted faucet height should be under 17.5 inches (450mm).
Material and Durability: made of high-quality metal stainless steel and durable enough for long-term use. The over-the-sink dish drying rack Load-bearing is 80 pounds.

Multiple Color Coating and offer large sizes: There are Black, White, Brown, and Silver for choice to fit various kitchen themes. Also, we offer other larger sizes up to 41.5 inches if you want to search: B0825M453D

Installation and Usage: Easily install the dish drying rack over the sink with step-by-step instructions on paper. we also provide E-instructions if need. The dish drying rack extends to occupy 12.4 inches from back to front on the counter.
body.description: SNTD Over the Sink Dish Drying Rack Adjustable Expand for more storage space Create valuable vertical space with this sleek-looking dish drying rack for kitchen countertop from SNTD. Combining contemporary good looks with a conveniently flexible design, the dish drainer adds some storage function in the kitchen.Shelf outside size: (26.8"-34.6") W x 12.4"D x 20.5"H, Inside size: (25.6"-33.5") W x 12.4"D x 20.5"H. The height of the faucet should be ≤ 16.5".

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dish Drying Rack Over Sink Save Space for Your Kitchen Countertop
Expandable Over the Sink Dish Drying Rack for Kitchen Countertop

Work Over The Sink Placed it over the kitchen sink, the dish drying rack with other holders holds goods such as mugs, dishes, bowls, utensils, chopping board, knife, and detergent, etc. Hooks are allowed Hanging cooking ware on the rack. Keep your sink and countertop neat and create tons of extra useful space.

Stable Reasons -Unique L shaped base, Suction cups adsorption. Efficient - Save tons of space and time by making it easier to access kitchen supplies. Hooks - Extra equipped with utility hooks to hang tools of the kitchen. Easily install - Come with steps by steps instructions sheet and install tools.

Unique L Shaped Base Stand Up Unique L Shaped Base Stand up creates a triangle and larger contacting area, provides Robust holding performance and is more stable than H shaped and U shaped base. Hanging Hollow Card Slot Design Plug in - Install holders for organizing. Lift up - Remove holders for cleaning. No more complicated steps for daily use. Suction Cups Design Anti-slip suction cups can produce adsorption force with the countertop, which prohibits dish rack from shaking back and forth.

reviews.reviewerName: The tripod stand can easily get broken.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Has Exceeded My Expectations!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Sink Dish Drying Rack, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This product is a game-changer in the kitchen! The design is not only sleek and modern, but it's also incredibly functional.The ample space provided by the drying rack allows for efficient air drying of dishes, cutting down on the time it takes for them to dry naturally. The thoughtful placement of slots and compartments accommodates various kitchen items, from plates and bowls to utensils and even cutting boards.I also appreciate the easy assembly and disassembly of the rack, making it convenient for cleaning or storage when not in use. The minimalist design not only enhances the overall aesthetics of my kitchen but also makes it easy to integrate into any decor style.Overall, the Sink Dish Drying Rack has proven to be an invaluable addition to my kitchen. It's a well-crafted, practical solution for keeping my dishes organized and dry. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and stylish dish drying solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Space Saver!
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly over our sink. We have a double sink so I was worried it would not fit but it's just long enough. We have been using it for just over a month daily- we do not have a dishwasher atm. It's very sturdy and the dishes dry very fast. There is also a surprising amount of room for drying. With that being said if you have a lot of larger dishes that need to dry, especially pots and pans it does fill up fast. We also have very large dinner plates, they fit but we do have to put them in at an angle.I was also worried that the top rack would get in the way while washing but that is not the case. There are no issues using the sink or our hose attachment which is on the side of the sink. Most of the water from the dishes will drip back into the sink which is great- no more soaking wet dish mats or towels! We do place towel on the edges to catch the drips from the pan holder, silverware and cups but it's minimal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST DISH RACK EVER!
reviews.reviewText: By far one of my favorite purchases from Amazon! I have very limited counter space and this has opened up so much space. It’s also very sturdy, looks sleek, and quick to assemble. If you’re thinking about purchasing.. this is your sign to do so! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good in the kitchen
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Screws were a little tough to start. Looks good in the kitchen and saves space on the counter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my little kitchen! (One thing to improve though)
reviews.reviewText: So glad I bought this dish rack. It fits my small kitchen counter over the sink perfectly!The width is adjustable too.One thing to improve though: the bars on the bottom of the cup rack are too short and not angular enough to hold mugs and tall water glass (they might fall out). Only the top row of the cup rack bars can hold mugs, but still can't hold tall water glasses....But in general, pretty happy about it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 Recommend! Space Saver, Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because my brother bought it and raved about it. It was super easy for one person to assemble and is made out of high-quality materials. All sections (shelves, holders, etc.) are optional to include when building but everything shown comes in this kit.We do not have a dishwasher and also have a very small kitchen so this is a lifesaver. It even has a compartment where we now store all of our knives - further saving counter space. The rack also extends to a wider width. Completely collapsed it fit our sink perfectly (standard small sink). Will fit much larger sinks if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for Small Spaces
reviews.reviewText: Bought this and was not disappointed. This thing is STURDY!! Good quality build and gave us back so much counter space. Was also impressed by the weight it could hold without tipping over. Worth the cost. This is a 5-star buy 👍✨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: everyone could use more counter space. even if the counter space by the sink is not a useful location (ours is in a corner), taking away the old dish rack is just aesthetically nice, de-clutters things. makes the areas feel less cramped. was a nice surprise.mainly we got this because we found bugs started hanging out in our old rack. the way most drying racks work, water drips. not nearly enough to wash away though. it just makes the area under the dishes damp. which is bad for bugs and mildew. not that this is puddle-proof, but putting wet dishes over the sink is a great solution.also putting it together was not awful. most stuff you have to build ends up slightly ruined trying to follow bad instructions. however, this was made in pieces (obviously for shipping), with some forethought. you almost can't build it wrong, so wasn't a prob tghat the instructions weren't perfect (pretty good though).another nice surprise was that once the frame is built, you can easily set up the bins in various configurations. needn't be like in the pic, and almost no effort required to rearrange as needed.they don't explain how to make the unit wider, but it's pretty clear from the design , if you need to do that. and then re-adjust if you move to a new place. it's not a permanent setting.

This is one of the best items I have purchased. It’s easy to put together, adjusts to sink width, and is very sturdy and solid. I am a senior in a smallish apt and this freed up both of my sinks. Along with the hanging light, also from Amazon, it is making my place a home.

reviews.reviewTitle: Purchased twice and very very useful
reviews.reviewText: Useful for kitchen use to dry dishes. Easy to assemble and sturdy. Holds a bunch of stuff and looks great
La calidad s según su costo, por lo que puedo decir que estoy satisfecho con mi compra.

reviews.reviewTitle: Counter space saver, my favourite dish rack
reviews.reviewText: Have used this dish rack for about 8 months, and it stays together like new. At first I was worried about whether it can handle weight. It holds up when I have 2 stainless steel pots and a large frying pan, and a bunch of dishes on it (although I avoided placing cast iron pots on).The design is what got me to purchase, because having water drips right back into the sink makes sense. Dishes seem to dry quicker than on-the-country racks, perhaps because mine sits right in front of window and gets airflow.If you have cats, this is the best dish rack. Cats won't walk all over it leaving hair on clean dishes, and this dish rack saves counter space for them to walk on, so they love it too!I recommand this product. It is slightly pricey, but the fact that it holds up to weight, saves counter space, and overall has a good design, it's worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a small kitchen. I don’t have room for a dish washer. So I bought this. Firstly it was easy to make. I set it up the way it suits my sink and work top. It can hold a lot. It’s good quality and very sturdy. I am very happy with this and would recommend this product. Initially I was concerned about the price, however after using it for a couple months, it’s well worth it.
